comments.author: Uwe Schindler
comments.body: Mike: Oh a new generics policeman, your second police operation :-)

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.body: Hey I'm just the messenger -- Kay Kay is the 2nd policeman :)

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.body: Patch looks good -- I'll commit shortly.  Thanks Kay Kay!

description:
LUCENE-1257 in Lucene 3.0 addressed porting to generics across public api-s . LUCENE-2065 addressed across src/test . 

This would be a placeholder JIRA for any remaining pending generic conversions across the code base. 

Please keep it open after commiting and we can close it when we are near a 3.1 release , so that this could be a placeholder ticket.
summary: Port to Generics - test cases in contrib
